Title: Be Kind, Rewind
Plot: Allison dreams about the same day over and over again. Each time she finds more important clues. Joe tries to get affection from Allison. Ariel has problems at school.
GuestStars: Lavetta Cannon, Don Luce, Josh T. Minnick, Karen Maxwell, Jodi Carlisle, Richard Hilton, Adam Gorelick, Tyrees Allen, Jamie Nations, K. T. Thangavelu, Sky Soleil, Shashawnee Hall, Brad Greenquist, Antonio Mayans
